Summary: Two powerfully bright lights fixed opposite one another w/ transparent cylindar like object between them
divs: Sighting DetailsTravelling North bound on HWY 360 in Arlington, TX. Passing General Motors, I looked up in the North sky, just North of the Six Flags Mall and there were two powerfully bright lights in the dark sky [10:38pm]. The lights were opposite of each other & the craft was stationary stationary initially, then it began to elevate moderately. The closer it got to the clouds, the gray over cast became lighted and visible like lingering smoke --in the once dark sky. Suddenly the crafts speed of ascention was rapidly increased and the object shot up into the clouds. The clouds bore a cylinder clearance where the object had just vanished into-- and shortly there after the clouds disapated from the cylinder clearance form...as if it never happened.
trends: There have been 43 other sightings in Arlington
There were no other sightings in Arlington on or around December 11th 2009
